title: The Chinese Businessman Paradox
author: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: The article explores the "Chinese businessman paradox," a cultural trope in Malaysia and Singapore celebrating the business acumen of Chinese entrepreneurs, often stemming from humble beginnings.  It examines the characteristics associated with this "Chinese businessman wisdom," questioning its definition and how it can be acquired, contrasting it with other terms like "business savvy." The article uses the example of the author's friend's father, a successful businessman in Kuching, to illustrate the points.
